Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes a closed-circuit television system and surveillance personal privacy act
Summary: Establishes a public authority closed-circuit television system and surveillance personal privacy act, a state highway closed-circuit television system and surveillance personal privacy act and a municipal closed-circuit television system and surveillance personal privacy act.
LawCode: Add Art 1-B §§52 - 55, Pub Auth L; add Art 23 §§500 - 503, Transp L; add Art 14-B-1 §§375 - 378, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the transportation law and the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a closed-circuit television system and surveillance personal privacy act
